data.title: Heirloom Books Chicago
data.meta_description: Cozy eclectic used bookstore located in Chicago at 6239 N Clark St. A used bookstore should cherish the growth of book-reading, one page at a time. Chicago book stores are heirlooms to our city, thus our name. Come check us out, and say hello! (We're dog friendly, too!)
data.text:
Quo Vadis

Henryk Sienkiewicz

$15.00

The Polish writer Henryk Sienkiewicz wrote the novel Quo Vadis: A Narrative of the Time of Nero (1895â€“96), which in turn has been made into motion pictures several times, including a 1951 version that was nominated for eight Academy Awards. For this and other novels, Sienkiewicz received the 1905 Nobel Prize for Literature.
